name: torre-tempo
description: Spanish labor law compliant staff clocking system

scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/api && npm run test -w apps/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/web && npm run lint -w apps/api
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w apps/web && npm run lint:fix -w apps/api
